how do i shutdown the xserver ?: nvidia installe wants me to end the xserver for installation
/etc/init.d/gdm stop and then make sure X is shut down
you typed it wrong.  "/etc/init.d/gdm stop" is what you have to run
why does that make a difference ?
yes it makes -all- the difference wether you put "stop" after it or not
i changed to /etc/int.d/ and entered "sudo gdm stop".
you have to put the whole path
looks like i terribly misunderstood something in the topic file hirarchy *?*

you are trying to run a program in /etc/init.d/ and . is not in $PATH and when a shell executes something it looks in $PATH, starting with the first entry, so it finds /usr/bin/gdm instead of /etc/init.d/gdm
ah perfect awnser. thanks for the explanation
